THE NUT TALE  BY ME

  THE NUT TALE  

ONE DAY  THRE WAS A SQUIRREL LIVING IN THE FOREST 
THE SQUIRREL LOVES NUTS AND THAT S ALL IT WANTED TO HAVE IN ITS WHOLE LIFE 
YOU COULD SAY THAT THE SQUIRREL IS A NUT CONNOISSEUR 
EVERY MORNING  IT WOKE UP AND HAD SOME TASTY NUT AS ITS BREAKFAST 
IT EVEN HAD A NICE AND WARM NUT MILK TO COMPLETE THE BREAKFAST 
AFTER THAT  THE SQUIRREL WROTE DOWN IN ITS LITTLE NUTTY NOTEBOOK  ALL THE NUTS IT WANTED TO FIND AND TASTE 

IN THE AFTERNOON  THE SQUIRREL WENT OUT TO MEET ITS FRIENDS WHO WERE ALSO NUT ENTHUSIASTS 
THEY WOULD TALK ABOUT NUTS FOR A LONG TIME 
IN SPECIAL OCCASSIONS  THEY WOULD BRING THEIR NUTS FROM HOME AND EXCHANGED THEIR NUTS 
THE NUT EXCHANGE WAS TO LET THEMSELVES TO TASTE EACH OTHER S FAVORITE NUT 

THE TOWN S PEOPLE KNEW THAT THE SQUIRREL WAS A BIG NUT FAN 
THERE WERE SOME PEOPLE WHO WERE WILLING TO GIVE THE SQUIRREL SOME OF THEIR NUTS FOR FREE 
BEFORE EVENING  THE SQUIRREL WOULD GO AROUND TOWN TO COLLECT PEOPLE S NUTS 
FREE NUTS  AMAZING NUTS  TASTY NUTS 

THE SQUIRREL WALKED HOME BRINGING A LOT OF NUTS FROM THE PEOPLE 
THERE WERE TIMES WHEN THE SQUIRREL HAD TO PUT SOME OF THE NUTS INSIDE ITS MOUTH SINCE ITS HANDS COULDN T CARRY MORE NUTS 
IT WOULD WALK AROUND LIKE THIS  MUMBLE 

THE SQUIRREL ENJOYED ITS LIFE VERY MUCH 
A FULFILLING LIFE FULL OF NUTS 

THE END
